revision.text: {{afd-merged-from|Syracuse University ambulance|Syracuse University ambulance|17 May 2011}} {{User:MiszaBot/config |archiveheader = {{talkarchivenav}} |maxarchivesize = 45K |counter = 5 |minthreadsleft = 5 |algo = old(45d) |archive = Talk:Syracuse University/Archive %(counter)d }}{{ArticleHistory |action1=FAC |action1date=17:08, 17 January 2009 |action1link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Syracuse University/archive1 |action1result=not promoted |action1oldid=264122976 |action2=GAN |action2date=23:18, 20 December 2010 |action2link=Talk:Syracuse University/GA1 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=403410033 |currentstatus=GA |topic=Education }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell| {{WikiProject Universities|class=GA|collaboration-past=[[December 21]], [[2007]] - [[January 03]], [[2008]]}} {{WikiProject Libraries|class=GA|auto=no|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Syracuse, New York|class=GA|importance=High}} {{WikiProject Atlantic Coast Conference|class=GA|importance=High}} {{WikiProject Christianity|class=GA|auto=no|importance=Low|methodism-work-group=yes}} }}{{todo|1|small=yes}} {{archivebox|auto=yes}} == Amartya Sen == Mr. Sen the Nobel laureate is NOT an SU alumnus. To the clown who keeps on adding his name to the list, DON'T. I moved the all-century basketball thing to the [[Syracuse University Orange]] article. It's too long and technical for this article. [[User:Newkai|newkai]] == Campus protests == An unregistered editor recently [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Syracuse_University&type=revision&diff=690377420&oldid=690022587 added] over 14,000 bytes of new information in a new "Campus Organizing" section. I objected to the material and removed but he or she [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Syracuse_University&type=revision&diff=690386218&oldid=690379009 immediately restored] most of it without discussion. Setting aside the minor issues such as a confusing section title with improper capitalization, there are huge issues with the material that has been added. First, the material contains very few [[WP:RS|reliable sources]]. In the gigantic section dedicated to the 2014 incidents, the only sources that are cited are a [http://thefeministwire.com/2015/02/college-feminisms-and-we-sat-violence-against-the-bodies-of-diversity-and-transparency-dat-student-movement-at-syracuse-university/ first-person article] written by a college student and a [http://thefeministwire.com/2015/02/college-feminisms-and-we-sat-violence-against-the-bodies-of-diversity-and-transparency-dat-student-movement-at-syracuse-university/ 23-minute YouTube video] of unknown origin. Even if we concede that these sources are reliable, they are both primary sources which leaves the section in trouble as far as [[WP:DUE|due weight]] is concerned. In other words, if the material is truly noteworthy enough to include in an encyclopedia then editors should be able to find secondary or tertiary sources that support it otherwise we risk crossing into [[WP:POV]] and [[WP:OR]] territory. The material in the "THE General Body" section has a handful of reliable sources but some of the sources there, too, are poor. Second, the material in the "THE General Body" section is way over the line in terms of [[WP:DUE|due weight]] and clearly advocates for the position of this organization which is an [[WP:NPOV|obvious problem]]. The section needs to be dramatically reduced, probably to just a few sentences with much better sourcing, to place this into the proper historical context. And those sources should be secondary or tertiary with little or no reliance on primary sources such as the website of the organization in question. Editors are reminded that this is an encyclopedia, not a venue to promote their own views. [[User:ElKevbo|ElKevbo]] ([[User talk:ElKevbo|talk]]) 05:40, 13 November 2015 (UTC) :I couldn't find a single notable sentence. The closest one was about broken windows and barricaded doors in 1970, which is still incredibly far from the mark of notable. I have removed the whole section and notified the user to discuss here. '''[[User:Jolly Janner|Jolly]] [[Special:Contributions/Jolly Janner|Ω]] [[User talk:Jolly Janner|Janner]]''' 00:03, 17 November 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[Syracuse University]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=697752210 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20120924021318/http://thewarehousegallery.syr.edu:80/about.html to http://thewarehousegallery.syr.edu/about.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20140320185011/http://lubinhouse.syr.edu/palitzgallery/ to http://lubinhouse.syr.edu/palitzgallery/ *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20080725055530/http://www.ecac.org/membership/division_I/index to http://www.ecac.org/membership/division_I/index *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20080725181801/http://undergraduatestudies.syr.edu/Lockerbiescholars/home.html to http://undergraduatestudies.syr.edu/Lockerbiescholars/home.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 17:53, 1 January 2016 (UTC) == Can anybody get a photo of == The [[Tree of 40 Fruit]]. It is supposed to be on the "main quad". Please see the tree's article and the videos there will probably give somebody who knows the campus a very good idea of the exact location. Any help would be appreciated. [[User:Smallbones|Smallbones]]([[User talk:Smallbones|smalltalk]]) 02:29, 21 March 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Syracuse University]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=714869333 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Corrected formatting/usage for http://lubinhouse.syr.edu/palitzgallery/ When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 09:37, 12 April 2016 (UTC)
